meanings.definition: Granddaddies: plural noun, informal term for grandfathers
meanings.sent1: My granddaddies always tell the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my granddaddies on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my granddaddies start a game of chess, watch out!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my granddaddies is a beacon in my life.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my granddaddies echoes through the house.

meanings.definition: Granddaddies: plural noun, informal term for something considered the best or most important in a particular group
meanings.sent1: In our family, the old oak tree is the granddaddies of all trees.
meanings.sent2: The antique clock is the granddaddies of our collection.
meanings.sent3: The granddaddies of all desserts is definitely the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent4: His vintage car is the granddaddies of all cars in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The granddaddies of all movies is the classic film we watch every year.

meanings.definition: Granddaddies: plural noun, informal term for large or impressive examples of something
meanings.sent1: The granddaddies of all sandwiches at the deli is the foot-long sub.
meanings.sent2: The granddaddies of all waves crashed against the shore during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The granddaddies of all snowflakes landed on my nose.
meanings.sent4: The granddaddies of all mountains stood majestically in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The granddaddies of all flowers bloomed in the garden.
